channel.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
channel.description:
Did NASA fake the landings? Or do you think we really went there.
I'll provide my beliefs in a little, after some responses.

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

AtomicInt_:

There are several photographs of objects that are in shadows, yet they appear lighted and with surprising detail. Objects located in shadows should appear totally black, and the shadow side of the astronauts appear illuminated, while the shadow side of rocks appear totally black.

you display a complete lack of understanding as to how exposure works

furthermore any evidence in this thread has been debunked by mythbusters

Read full topic
item.source: Have we ever really landed on the moon?

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @slavemaster veer
item.description:
@slavemaster wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Lunar Laser Ranging experiment

The ongoing Lunar Laser Ranging experiment measures the distance between Earth and the Moon using laser ranging. Lasers on Earth are aimed at retroreflectors planted on the Moon during the Apollo program (11, 14, and 15), the two Lunokhod missions, and the upcoming MoonLIGHT retroreflector to be deployed by the private MX-1E lander. The time for the reflected light to return is measured, and the distance is calculated. The first successful tests were carried out in 1962 when a team from the Mas...

Read full topic

lol.

item.source: Have we ever really landed on the moon?

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

AtomicInt_:

If we did, why hasn’t Russia? During that time they were on our ass for everything. By now don’t you think they would have?

Russia hasn’t landed on the moon because they had the typical “Guns or Butter” situation backfire. They invested all of their money in their military to keep their military as large as ours, but as a result could not feed their population whereas we could feed our population due to a larger economy. After the USSR collapsed, they stopped investing in all government funded programs such as their space program. They still haven’t funded the program much, so they never developed the technology to travel to the moon.

Read full topic
item.source: Have we ever really landed on the moon?

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:464124”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=567950.msg4124569#msg4124569 date=1350232160]
There are more than a few photographs which are original, as in, before N.A.S.A. doctored them up. They not only show buildings, but also things that would blow your mind which are on the Moon. Such as mountains of Gold, immense buildings and castles, etc. Their videos are also heavily edited on purpose.
[/quote]

There are several photographs of objects that are in shadows, yet they appear lighted and with surprising detail. Objects located in shadows should appear totally black, and the shadow side of the astronauts appear illuminated, while the shadow side of rocks appear totally black.

read this: http://www.braeunig.us/space/hoax.htm[/quote]
Watch Mythbusters and do not underestimate the Soviet Union.

Read full topic
item.source: Have we ever really landed on the moon?

Such as mountains of Gold, immense buildings and castles, etc. Their videos are also heavily edited on purpose.
[/quote]
read this: http://www.braeunig.us/space/hoax.htm[/quote]
Way to fucking long; didn’t read.

I believe we did, since no other country has ever said anything about it, but it is hard to find any legitimate photos of us on the moon. I mean:

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Bowser jr:

The USSR would have be the first one to know if it was fake. If they didn’t complain, it is legit.

They were all drunks. They probably made their whole space program up.

Read full topic
item.source: Have we ever really landed on the moon?

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Team_Rocket:

There are more than a few photographs which are original, as in, before N.A.S.A. doctored them up. They not only show buildings, but also things that would blow your mind which are on the Moon. Such as mountains of Gold, immense buildings and castles, etc. Their videos are also heavily edited on purpose.

There are several photographs of objects that are in shadows, yet they appear lighted and with surprising detail. Objects located in shadows should appear totally black, and the shadow side of the astronauts appear illuminated, while the shadow side of rocks appear totally black.

read this: http://www.braeunig.us/space/hoax.htm

Read full topic

item.title: Have we ever really landed on the moon?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:1, topic:464124”]Did NASA fake the landings? Or do you think we really went there.

I’ll provide my beliefs in a little, after some responses.[/quote]

I believe we have landed there, due to the fact that we have acquired the scientific requirements for landing there. If we haven’t actually landed there, then we do have the ability to but never bothered.
